# Imports

```{r}
install.packages("janitor")
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

# Data Collection

```{r}
library(readr)
df <- read_csv("datasets/train.csv")
#View(train
#glimpse(df)
```

# Data Cleaning

```{r}
df1 <- janitor::clean_names(df)

df %>% names()
df1 %>% names()
```

## Data Types

```{r}
str(df1)
```

```{r}
tibble(variables = names(df1),
       type = unlist(lapply(df1, class)))
```
